definition: one instant/very short time/the twinkle of an eye
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Beauty can just stay a moment , like that shallow dimple .
sentences.chinese: 美，不过一瞬，犹若那个浅浅的酒窝。

sentences.english: Then, in an instant, the moon went black.
sentences.chinese: 然后，在一瞬间，月亮变成了黑色。

sentences.english: When Rhaegal roared, a gout of yellow flame turned darkness into day for half a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 当雷哥怒吼时，一瞬间一股黄焰将黑暗变成白昼。

sentences.english: I am a meteor, a heart from your fingers fiery stars star.
sentences.chinese: 我是一颗流星，一颗从你指间一瞬即逝的星。

sentences.english: Cling to you sweet. Ten years only flashed by.
sentences.chinese: 贪恋你的甜蜜，十年不过短短的一瞬。

sentences.english: Then, in an instant, everything changed.
sentences.chinese: 但，所有事情改变在一瞬间。

sentences.english: For a moment, he withholds, mouth full of pause…
sentences.chinese: 一瞬间，他忍住口胤中的千言万语。

sentences.english: He always comes rushing up at the last moment.
sentences.chinese: 他往往到最后的一瞬间才急忙赶来。

sentences.english: He rode the ferry over, and I knew him the moment I saw him.
sentences.chinese: 他乘坐了轮渡过来，当我看到他的一瞬间就认出了他。

sentences.english: A man's reputation may be sacrifice in a moment of ill-considered action.
sentences.chinese: 一个人的声誉可能断送在考虑欠周的那一瞬间。

sentences.english: Those people who always have that precise, instant stabled on their life.
sentences.chinese: 那些人会把那一瞬深深地刻进他的生命。

sentences.english: You are a hologram, held together by infinite energy through all spaces (mind) in one instant.
sentences.chinese: 你就是一份全息图，在一瞬间，穿过所有时空。

sentences.english: In that instant, the worries of my day at work fade away.
sentences.chinese: 在那一瞬间，一天的工作忧虑都消逝了。

sentences.english: Xiao li fly knife moment, KuangXiang into little eunuch.
sentences.chinese: 小李飞刀一瞬间，匡翔变成小太监。

sentences.english: In a split second the melon is vapourised.
When you grab the new trapeze, personal growth is over.
sentences.chinese: 当你抓到新吊杠的那一瞬，成长也就结束了。

definition: an instant (Sanskrit: ksana)/split second/the twinkling of an eye
in the twinkling of an eye/in a flash/to turn one's eyes
in the wink of an eye/in a flash
to blink/to wink/in the twinkling of an eye
